eu_initiatives: Horizon Europe, 9th Framework Program for Research and Innovation; biomedical research and innovation policy; and advanced therapy medicinal products.
organisation_name: International Society for Stem Cell Research (ISSCR)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
legal_status: Not for profit organization registered in the United States as a 501(c)(3) under the Internal Revenue Code
goals__remit: The International Society for Stem Cell Research is an independent, nonprofit organization established to promote and foster the exchange and dissemination of information and ideas relating to stem cells, to encourage the general field of research involving stem cells, and to promote professional and public education in all areas of stem cell research and application.
